channel.title: AI on picklejuice

item.title: MkDoc Maker
item.description: MkDoc Maker is an AI powered markdown writing assistant that will help write high quality technical documentation faster. You can reference technical thirdparty documents or upload images and let the Ai extract suitable information to add to the document. Or when starting a new documentation project, just write up some messy notes and let the assistant come up with suitable headings. Finally you can also review and tune specific sections of your documentation.
